eng: He swims better than I do.
I think I left my wallet at home.
cmn: 我想我把錢包放家裡了。

eng: The ceremony began with his speech.
Tom still doesn't know the truth.
What was it that you gave him?
We're confident of victory.
I'd like something to eat.
I prefer apples to oranges.
cmn: 相对于橙子，我更喜欢苹果。

eng: Many young people in Japan eat bread for breakfast.
cmn: 許多日本的年輕人吃麵包當作早餐。

eng: Tom didn't write Mary back.
I need to complete it as soon as possible.
He will be my deputy while I am away.
cmn: 我不在的时候，他将是我的代理人。

eng: I'll still have a scar from that accident.
cmn: 我还留着那起事故的伤疤。

eng: She didn't have any pencils.
Apples were served as the dessert.
He is not as intelligent as his brother.
This is a crucial point.
We're used to staying up late.
The woman glared at us.
Thanks for returning my call.
Tom can't drive a bus.
She went for a walk.
Tom was never happy.
He failed to pass his driving test.
cmn: 他沒有通過他的駕駛考試。

eng: I'm proud of my son.
This kind of plant grows only in the tropical regions.
cmn: 這類植物只生長在熱帶地區。

eng: I was wondering if you were going to show up today.
cmn: 我在想你今天会不会来。

eng: Isn't this weather just great!
You should have seen it.
I've had a bath.
Love is like oxygen.
The doctor tried every possible means to save his patient.
cmn: 为抢救病人医生已尽力了。

eng: He comes back from Sydney today.
I don't like what he said.
This place gives me a really bad vibe.
cmn: 这地方给我一个很差的印象。

eng: I've changed my website's layout.
cmn: 我改了一下我网站的版面设计。

eng: Tom played the violin.
You haven't changed at all.
Even a teacher can make mistakes.
It's all the same to me.
The baby tore up a ten-dollar bill.
cmn: 這個小嬰孩撕掉了一張十美元的鈔票。

eng: I thanked Mary for her help.
cmn: 我对玛丽的帮助表示了感谢。

eng: What you're saying makes no sense.
He's always worrying about his daughter.
cmn: 他一直很担心他的女儿。

eng: I went there because I wanted to.
cmn: 我去了那裡，因為我想去。

eng: Don't rush into marriage.
Your room is big.
He's not home.
My father is far from artistic.
cmn: 我父親一點也不懂藝術。

eng: Don't come into my room.
I'm absolutely elated.
The building has 20 floors.
How much money does he make a month?
My heart's beating so fast!
Get me some towels from the bathroom.
cmn: 给我从浴室拿几条毛巾来。

eng: Life without love has no meaning.
cmn: 没有爱的人生没有意义。

eng: I want you to be prepared.
Bring the water to a boil.
Give me my beer.
I've lost my umbrella.
